Episodes.Title: Way to Go!: A Travel Adventure
Episodes.Plot: Daniel explains to Barney, Baby Bop, BJ, and the kids how he and his family will use different modes of transportation on their cruise vacation. With a little imagination, Barney, Baby Bop, BJ, and the kids use boxes to build some cars, a plane, a bus, and a cruise ship.

Episodes.Title: The Misbegotten Moon, A Space Adventure
Episodes.Plot: Baby Bop sees a half-moon & thinks the moon is broken. Barney takes her to see the Man in the Moon.

Episodes.Title: The Sword In The Sandbox, A Storybook Adventure
Episodes.Plot: Daniel wants to jump rope with some older children but is afraid he is too little to do it right.

Episodes.Title: Ready Set Play
Episodes.Plot: Barney tells Riff the story of his great-great-grandpa Riffle from the Wild West.

Episodes.Title: Songs from the Park
Episodes.Plot: Grace's friends come up with different ideas for her food drive.
